text: yibian tamen jianzheng dui tamen youyi de xuduo shi [ru zhao jin zai houshi de baochou deng], bing zai guiding de rizi li [yi li 12 yue 10 ri zhi 13 ri] yi nian an la zhi ming er zai an la ciyu tamen zuo zaisheng yong de shengchu [zaisheng shi nian: Feng'an la zhi ming, an la zhi da. An la a! Women laizi yu ni, women hai jiang guiyu ni]. Ranhou, nimen ke chi qi rou, ye keyong lai kuandai jidu pinkun de qiongren.
